amendments.title: To rescind $4,586,000,000 from foreign assistance and exchange programs.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 902 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 77 - 15. Record Vote Number: 183.

amendments.title: In the nature of a substitute.
amendments.latest_major_action: Amendment SA 901, under the order of 06/26/19, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 8. Record Vote Number: 184.

amendments.title: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 462, the amendment printed in House Report 116-128 is adopted.
